Service Function ID and Name: HCM.A7-2 Administrative Grievances and Third-Party Proceedings
Service Measure Description: Measures the average time (in days) the service provider takes to forward mediation requests to the deciding official, if applicable.
Service Measurement Formula Combined wit:
Numerator:  Total time (in days) to forward mediation requests to the deciding official for all applicable grievances processed in the past quarter*.

Denominator:  Total # of applicable grievances (in days) processed in the past quarter (in the past quarter or the agency-determined timeframe).  

Calculation: 
(Total time (in days) to forward mediation requests to the deciding official for all applicable grievances processed)/(Total # of applicable grievances processed)

Service Function ID and Name: HCM.A7-2 Administrative Grievances and Third-Party Proceedings
Service Measure Description: Measures the average time the service provider takes to issue a formal grievance decision.
Service Measurement Formula Combined wit:
Calculation = 100*(Numerator/Denominator)

Numerator:  Total time (in days) to issue a formal grievance decision for all applicable grievances processed in the past quarter*.

Denominator:  Total # of applicable grievances processed in the past quarter (in the past quarter or the agency-determined timeframe).

Service Function ID and Name: HCM.A7-2 Administrative Grievances and Third-Party Proceedings
Service Measure Description: Measures the average time the service provider takes to provide documented administrative grievance policies, procedures, and other conditions of employment, upon request.
Service Measurement Formula Combined wit:
Calculation = (Numerator/Denominator)

Numerator:  Total time (in days) to provide a documented administrative grievance policies, procedures, and other conditions of employment, upon request, for all applicable requests in the past quarter*.

Denominator:  Total # of applicable requests processed in the past quarter (in the past quarter or the agency-determined timeframe.)
